actions: Welcome to the server, ${player}! Please use /server to learn about the server before playing.
Welcome to the server! Below is some important information.
* /rules can be used to view the rules.
* We are split into teams of ~2 players each.
* We use a mod for our economy. Use /nuismatic to explore it. There are shops and a central bank (where you can exchange materials for money) at the central hub.
* We use a voice chat mod, so make sure to configure it properly.
* Ask for help from any admin if you need it. We can help with technical issues and issues with the server itself.
